item.title: Every Now and Then
item.description: I generally don’t spend that much time on Quora. I do get the emails but I’m just not that interested in the questions or answers for that matter to spend that much time except this particular one. 50 rules to live your life by Life: What advice would a 70 or 80 year old person give about the way the life should be lived? The most ‘upvoted’ answer was:
